word_mean: 湖水上下翻转与流动使上下水层充分混合、分层不明显的现象。

sentence.Network_en: He accused his opponents of wanting to overturn the government.
sentence.Network_cn: 他指责反对派企图颠覆政府。

sentence.Network_en: Horrified commuters saw the lorry veer across the motorway and overturn.
sentence.Network_cn: 惊恐万分的通勤者们看见那辆卡车突然冲向高速公路另一侧，接着翻倒在地。

sentence.Network_en: We saw the canoe overturn, throwing its passengers into the water.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们看到独木舟倾覆了, 把上面的乘客掀入水中.

overturn 翻转overturned anticline 倒转背斜overturned bed 倒转地层
overturn 　倾覆〔挡土墙〕；倒转overturning moment 　倾覆力矩；倾覆弯矩owner 　业主；业权人；拥有人
overturning cage platform 翻转罐笼台overturning platform 翻转台overturning skip 翻转箕斗

entry.def: If something overturns or if you overturn it, it turns upside down or on its side.

example.ex: The lorry veered out of control, overturned and smashed into a wall...
example.tran: 卡车突然失控，翻倒撞上了一堵墙。

example.ex: Alex jumped up so violently that he overturned his glass of sherry...
example.tran: 亚历克斯一下子暴跳起来，结果把他那杯雪利酒都打翻了。

entry.def: If someone in authority overturns a legal decision, they officially decide that that decision is incorrect or not valid.

example.ex: When the Russian parliament overturned his decision, he backed down...
example.tran: 俄罗斯议会推翻了他的决定，他只好作罢。

example.ex: His nine-month sentence was overturned by Appeal Court judge Lord Justice Watkins.
example.tran: 上诉法院法官沃特金斯撤销了对他作出的9个月徒刑的判决。

entry.def: To overturn a government or system means to remove it or destroy it.

example.ex: He accused his opponents of wanting to overturn the government.
example.tran: 他指责反对派企图颠覆政府。

example.ex: ...a society where all the old values had been overturned.
example.tran: 摒弃了所有旧价值观的社会

sentences.sentence: "he was badly bruised by the upset of his sled at a high speed"
"the biggest upset since David beat Goliath"

means.word_mean: 1. turn from an upright or normal position;

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"翻转"; 2. 表示"在……之上"; 3. 表示"过度,过分,超过"

stems_affixes.word_buile: over过度,过分,超过+all全部→adj.全部的, 全面的
over过度,过分,超过+correct改正→adj.矫枉过正的
over过度,过分,超过+crowded拥挤的→adj.挤满的
over超过+sea海+s复数→adv.海外 adj.外国的, 海外的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 紧张过度的,兴奋过度的
stems_affixes.word_buile: over过度,过分,超过+wrought=work工作→过度工作
over翻转+night夜, 夜晚→翻过一夜→一夜间→一下子;突然
over超过+sea海+s复数→adv.海外 adj.外国的, 海外的
over翻转+haul拉→拉过去检修
over翻转+throw扔→扔翻了→推翻
over翻转+turn转→翻转
over在……之上+bridge桥→上面的桥→天桥
over在……之上+coat衣服→在衣服上的衣服→外套
over过度,过分,超过+dose剂量→n.药物过量
over过度,过分,超过+production生产→n.生产过度
over过度,过分,超过+study学习→n.用功过度
over过度,过分,超过+work工作→n.过度劳累
over在……之上+lap交叉→[大腿]交叉→重叠
over过度,过分,超过+flow流动→流出来了,溢出
over翻转+take拿,占领→v.袭击,压倒
over在……之上+come来→来到上面→战胜
over在……之上+hang悬挂→v.悬于……之上, 悬垂
over在……之上+look看→在上面看→俯视,引申为疏忽
over在……之上+ride骑→骑在上面→推翻[下面的]
over在……之上+whelm推翻;淹没→翻过来→压倒
over过度,过分,超过+act演出→v.表演过火
